Title: A Worthy Challenge: Sha of Hatred
Description:
$n, I need you to assemble a tranquil group and lead them into the Shado-Pan Monastery. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and rescue Taran Zhu from the Sha of Hatred.

Return to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Shado-Pan Monastery Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Text: Complete the Shado-Pan Monastery Challenge Mode
